name: Cosmic Nagual Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle

50% Chance to Transform All Beneficial Effects, including Golden effects, on each enemy into a Stun, Freeze or Sleep effect, including Silver and Unblockable effects, and up to 3 Marks for 1 turn at the start of battle and at the start of your turn if you are not at full HP
Gain Immunity and Endure for 2 turns when you take damage
Once per battle, Revive with 10% HP and gain Immunity to Damage for 2 turns
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to the Shaman Eddie, Day Of The Dead Eddie, The Witch Doctor, The Nagual or Spirit Jaguar characters.
